section.title: jezebel
section.para: The jezebel module performs services checks against jezebel and simplifies its special-case Resmon output.
Resmon is a light-weight resource monitor that exposes health of services over HTTP in XML.
This module rides on the http module and provides a secondary phase of XML parsing on the contents that extracts Resmon status messages into metrics that can be trended.

listitem.para: The URL including schema and hostname (as you would type into a browser's location bar).
The TCP port can be specified to overide the default of 81.
All check config values are passed through to jezebel for execution.

example.title: Checking resmon services on OmniTI Labs.
example.para: This example checks the Resmon service on OmniTI Labs.
example.programlisting: <noit> <modules> <loader image="lua" name="lua"> <config><directory>/opt/reconnoiter/libexec/modules-lua/?.lua</directory></config> </loader> <jezebel> <config> <url>http://127.0.0.1:8083/dispatch/</url> </config> <module loader="lua" name="com.omniti.jezebel.SampleCheck" object="noit.module.jezebel"/> </jezebel> </modules> <checks> <labs target="8.8.38.5" module="com.omniti.jezebel.SampleCheck"> <check uuid="36b8ba72-7968-11dd-a67f-d39a2cc3f9de"/> </labs> </checks> </noit>
